LanguageData.Peaceful.label: Klidný
LanguageData.Peaceful.description: Pro ty kdo hledají relaxaci a tvoření kolonie v sandbox prostředí.\n\nMajor threatening events are disabled, but colonists can still get grumpy and animals can still go crazy from time to time.
LanguageData.VeryEasy.label: Stavitel
LanguageData.VeryEasy.description: Pro ty kdo hledájí tvoření kolonie s chutí nebezpečí.\n\nMajor threats appear, but they're weakened. Some of the extremely dangerous events are disabled.
LanguageData.Easy.label: Trochu výzvy
LanguageData.Easy.description: Pro hráče kteí hrají poprvé nebo pro příležitostní hráče kteří vyhledávají výzvu.\n\nThreats are dangerous but not brutal.
LanguageData.Medium.label: Rough
LanguageData.Medium.description: It's a rough planet.\n\nThreats can be quite dangerous. Not recommended until you've got some experience with the game.
LanguageData.Hard.label: Intenzivní
LanguageData.Hard.description: A significant challenge.\n\nSucceeding at this level requires a solid and well-rounded understanding of survival strategies, and some luck.
LanguageData.VeryHard.label: Extrémní
LanguageData.VeryHard.description: As hard as a diamond-bladed dagger.\n\nEnemies are numerous, prices are poor, food is scarce, and colonists are grumpy. For those who enjoy digital suffering.
